title: Pie
description:
A baked dish with a pastry crust, filled with sweet or savory ingredients. Appearance widely varies by platform.

Apple depicts a whole pie in a tin, its crimped crust scored to let out steam. WhatsApp and Twitter's designs depict a slice of cherry pie. 

Google's design previously showed a slice of pumpkin pie, as served at Thanksgiving.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's pie emoji presents a delectable slice of pie, complete with a golden-brown, flaky crust and a vibrant, jewel-toned filling, perhaps cherry or berry, rendered with realistic shading and depth. The soft, rounded edges and subtle highlights on the crust make it look almost good enough to eat, a hallmark of Apple's detailed 3D design. This emoji is commonly used to express enjoyment, comfort, or to refer to delicious food.
